text: Yarinjiye mugisagara mugihe abasangwa biwe bari batabizi ahasanga abantu babiri bariko bararwana, umwe yari mubagenzi biwe, uwundi nawe yari mubansi biwe, rero wamugenzi wiwe yamusavye imfashanyo kubera wamwansi wiwe, intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) yaciye amukubita igipfunsi aho nyene aca aracikana, aca avuga ati:- iki n’igikorwa ca Shetani, ntankeka uyu n’umwansi atakaza ari k’umugaragaro
